Markup

This site I just created for temporary use. It shows all the markup in markdown format you can use in the .md files and how they are styled.

Code

void setup() {
  size(400, 400);
  stroke(255);
  background(192, 64, 0);
}

void draw() {
  line(150, 25, mouseX, mouseY);
}

Unordered list

  • Another item in the same list.
